name: Sokobus
description:
You can move a character. His goal is simple: place the crates in objectives.

There are 20 levels, but you can create more using the editor on the desktop version.

Editor Controls

  • Left mouse button: places objects
  • Right mouse button: deletes objects
  • Ctrl + Left mouse button: selects objects
  • Ctrl + Right mouse button: unselects objects
  • Del : deletes selected objects
  • 1 to 5 (number keys): chooses an object
  • WASD/ZQSD: moves the whole layout
  • Tab: switches between locked/unlocked state
